query.statement: UPDATE SAPHEE.ZCST126 AS A SET A.CS126_ARA = #CAB# ,A.CS126_BSU = #CHB# ,A.CS126_JUJ = #JUB# ,A.CS126_BUJ = #BUB# ,A.CS126_TGB = #GHB# ,A.CS126_BPM = ( SELECT B.BSU_PM FROM SAPHEE.ZWBT010 B WHERE B.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND B.LGORT = #CHB# ) WHERE A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A.CS126_PJT = #PJT# AND A.CS126_HNO = #HNO# AND A.CS126_DDT = ''
